actions.name: Protosynthesis
actions.description: Effect: While Sunny Weather is active, the user's highest Base Stat, excluding HP, is increased by +30%, or +50% if the stat is SPD. If the user has an equipped Booster Energy, Protosynthesis can be activated for 5 Activations once per combat.

system.description: Effect: While Sunny Weather is active, the user's highest Base Stat, excluding HP, is increased by +30%, or +50% if the stat is SPD. If the user has an equipped Booster Energy, Protosynthesis can be activated for 5 Activations once per combat.
